title: Request a Payment Extension for a Utility Bill
description: A resident is having temporary financial difficulty and needs an extension on their water bill due date.

tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the resident's account and current balance.

tasks.description: Review the account history and eligibility for a payment extension.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the account is in good standing and eligible for an extension.

tasks.description: Process a two-week payment extension for the resident.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully updates the due date in the system and informs the resident.
